titleStmt.title: A poetical rapsodie containing: diuerse sonnets, odes, elegies, madrigals, epigrams, pastorals, eglogues, with other poems, both in rime and measured verse. For varietie and pleasure, the like neuer yet published.
titleStmt.author: Davison, Francis, 1575?-1619?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Roger Iackson dwelling in Fleetstreet neere the great Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
